# Expanded umbilical cord blood transplant achieves 94% survival in severe aplastic anemia

**Category:** health
**Generated (UTC):** 2025-12-15T05:55:05+00:00
**Published:** December 12, 2025
**Publisher:** National Institutes of Health (NIH)

## Summary
NIH-led clinical trial reports a 94% survival rate using an expanded umbilical cord blood transplant approach for patients with severe, treatment-limited aplastic anemia, representing a major advance for this high-risk group.

- https://www.nih.gov/news-events
